title: Microsoft releases Windows 11 build 22000.675 for Patch Tuesday
content:
Today is the second Tuesday of the month, and that makes it Patch Tuesday. It also means that all supported software from Microsoft is getting updated. That includes Windows 11, of course. If you’re on Windows 11, you’ll get KB5013943, bringing the build number to 22000.675. You can manually download it here. As usual, there’s

The post Microsoft releases Windows 11 build 22000.675 for Patch Tuesday appeared first on XDA.
description: It's Patch Tuesday, so Microsoft is releasing Windows 11 build 22000.675 as a mandatory update to all users. It has lots of fixes.
